account_is_not_public_yet: Not: Hesabınız, en az bir işlem gerçekleştirmezseniz veya bozuk para veya mesaj alamazsanız, blok zincirinde görünmez.

activate_hint: Lütfen parola sözcüklerini doğru sırayla düzenleyin. Bunu yaparak, parolayı güvende tuttuğunuzu onaylarsınız. Hesabınızı parola olmadan kontrol edemeyeceğinizi unutmayın.

activation_success: Başarıyla aktivasyon istendi. Hesabınız birkaç dakika içinde aktif hale gelecektir.

The alias will reference the account number entered and can be used to send burst to, messages, etc..

asset_exchange_duplicates_warning_plural: Warning: There are __count__ other assets with the same name in the asset exchange. Please make sure you choose the right one. Look at the account and asset ID for confirmation.
asset_name_help: Varlık adı geçersizdir. En az  3  en fazla  10   karakterden oluşması gerekmektedir.
brs_update_available: A new BRS release is available. It is recommended that you update.

error_alias_empty_uri: Bu rumuz boş bir URI ile bağlantılıdır.
error_alias_transfer_genesis: Genesis hesabına rumuz transferi izin verilmemektedir.

error_asset_decimals_plural: Sadece __count__ basamaktan sonraki  işaret bu  varlık için geçerlidir.
error_asset_or_account_id_required: Varlık veta hesap ID alanı gerklidir.
error_bid_order_filled: Teklif siparişi az önce zaten doldurdu.

error_buy_alias: An unknown error occured! Alias may or may not have been bought.
error_cancel_alias: Bilinmeyen bir hata oluştu. Rumuz satılmış olabilir veya  iptal edilememektedir.

error_cancel_sell_order: An unknown error occured! The sell order may or may not have been cancelled.
error_cast_vote: An unknown error occured! Vote may or may not be cast.
error_comma_not_allowed: Virgül kullanılamaz, bunun yerine nokta kullanın.
error_contact_account_id_exists: Bu hesap ID'li olan bir kişi zaten var.
error_contact_exists: Bu hesap ID'li olan bir kişi zaten var.
error_contact_name_exists: Bu adı taşıyan bir kişi zaten var.
error_create_poll: An unknown error occured! Poll may or may not be created.
error_decimals: Only 1 digit after the decimal mark is allowed.
error_decimals_plural: Only __count__ digits after the decimal mark are allowed.
error_decryption_passphrase_required: Bu iletinin şifresini çözmek için şifre gerekir.
error_decryption_unknown: An unknown error occured during decryption.
error_dgs_delivery: An unknown error occured! Marketplace purchase may or may not be delivered.
error_dgs_feedback: An unknown error occured! Marketplace purchase feedback may or may not be submitted.
error_dgs_listing: An unknown error occured! Marketplace listing may or may not be created.
error_dgs_not_listed: Goods not yet listed or already delisted.
error_dgs_purchase: An unknown error occured! Marketplace item may or may not have been purchased.
error_dgs_refund: An unknown error occured! Marketplace purchase may or may not be refunded.
error_duplicate_tags: The same tag was inserted multiple times.
error_encryption_browser_support: Your browser does not support client-side encryption. Aborting.
error_encryption_passphrase_required: Your passphrase is required to encrypt this message.
error_find_account_id: Could not find your account address.
error_forging_blockchain_downloading: Blockchain indiriliyor, bu süre içinde burst ağına destek sağlayamazsınız.Blockchain tam olarak indiğinde tekrar deneyin.
error_forging_blockchain_rescanning: Blockchain yeniden taranıyor, bu süre içinde burst ağına destek sağlayamazsınız. Lütfen bir dakika içinde yeniden deneyin.
error_forging_effective_balance: Efektif bakiyeniz sıfır,burst ağına destek sağlayamıyorsunuz.(Onaylanan 1440 blok  sonraki efektif bakiyeniz).
error_forging_no_public_key:
Hesabınızında ortak anahtar (public key) yok bu yüzden burst ağına destek sağlayamıyorsunuz.
Lütfen, ilk önce hesaptan bir gönderi yapın.
error_form_blockchain_rescanning: Blockchain şu anda yeniden taranıyor. Lütfen bir dakika sonra tekrar deneyin.
error_generate_public_key_no_password: Kullanıcı şifresi (user password) olmadan, ortak anahtar (public key) oluşturulamaz.
error_group_name: Grup adı için yalnızca alfanumerik karakterler kullanılabilir.
error_hash_verification: İndirilen hash bilgisi, belirtilen blokchain-hash bilgisinden farklı. DEVAM ETMEYİN.
error_invalid_input_numbers: Geçersiz bilgi . Yalnızca sayı ve nokta kabul edilir.
error_invalid_token: The token is NOT VALID. It appears to belong to account __account_link__. It was generated on __timestamp__.
error_issue_asset: An unknown error occured! Asset may or may not be created.
error_max_amount_warning: Your amount is higher than __burst__ BURST. Are you sure you want to continue? Click the submit button again to confirm.
error_max_asset_transfer_warning: Quantity specified is higher than __qty__. Are you sure you want to continue? Click the submit button again to confirm.
error_max_fee_warning: Your fee is higher than __burst__ BURST. Are you sure you want to continue? Click the submit button again to confirm.
error_max_tags: A maximum of __nr__ tags is allowed.
error_merchant_message_alphanumeric_leng: The message should be alphanumeric and have a length of __length__ characters.
error_merchant_message_alphanumeric_min_: The message should be alphanumeric and have a minimum length of __minLength__ characters.
error_merchant_message_alphanumeric_rang: The message should be alphanumeric and have a length of between __minLength__ and __maxLength__ characters.
error_merchant_message_custom_length: The message is incorrectly formatted and should have a length of __length__ characters.
error_merchant_message_custom_min_length: The message is incorrectly formatted and should have a minimum length of __minLength__ characters.
error_merchant_message_custom_range_leng: The message is incorrectly formatted and should have a length of between __minLength__ and __maxLength__ characters.
error_merchant_message_numeric_length: The message should be numeric and have a length of __length__ characters.
error_merchant_message_numeric_min_lengt: The message should be numeric and have a minimum length of __minLength__ characters.
error_merchant_message_numeric_range_len: The message should be numeric and have a length of between __minLength__ and __maxLength__ characters.
error_new_account: Yepyeni bir hesabınız var, hesabınızı  takviye edin.
error_not_specified_plural: At least one of __names__ must be specified.
error_numeric_ids_not_allowed: Sayısal hesap kimliği artık izin verilemiyor.
error_order_asset: Bilinmeyen bir hata oluştu! Sipariş süresi geçmiş olabilir.
error_passphrase_length: Parola en az 35 karakter uzunluğunda olmalıdır.
error_passphrase_length_secure: Şifreniz 35 karakter uzunluğundan  daha az. Bu güvenli değil.
error_passphrase_login_length: Your passphrase should be 35 characters in length or more, ideally over 40 characters. If you want to log in with this unsafe passphrase, hit ENTER again. If you are a new user, click the registration link below to register a secure passphrase.
error_passphrase_required_login: You must enter your passphrase. If you don't have one, click the registration button below.
error_passphrase_strength: Since your passphrase is less than 50 characters long, it must contain numbers and uppercase letters.
error_passphrase_strength_secure: Your passphrase does not contain numbers and uppercase letters. This is not secure.
error_post_only: This request is only accepted using POST!
error_public_key_already_announced: Bu hesap için ortak anahtar zaten duyuruldu.
error_public_key_announcement_no_recipie: Public key announcement cannot be attached to transactions with no recipient.
error_public_key_different_account_id: Announced public key does not match recipient account ID.
error_purchase_delivery: Purchase does not exist yet or not yet delivered.
error_purchase_not_exist_or_delivered: Purchase does not exist yet, or already delivered.
error_purchase_refund: Purchase does not exist or is not delivered or is already refunded.
error_recipient_no_public_key_announceme: Recipient account does not have a public key, must attach a public key announcement.
error_request_timeout: The request timed out. Warning: This does not mean the request did not go through. You should wait a couple of blocks and see if your request has been processed.
error_search_invalid: Invalid input. Search by ID only.
error_search_no_results: Nothing found, please try another query.
error_sell_alias: An unknown error occured! Alias sale offer may or may not be created.
error_send_encrypted_note: An unknown error occured! Message may or may not be sent.
error_send_message: An unknown error occured! Message may or may not be sent.
error_send_money: An unknown error occured! BURST may or may not be sent.
error_set_alias: An unknown error occured! Alias may or may not be registered.
error_set_reward_recipient: An unknown error occured! Your reward recipient has not been set.
error_stop_forging: You weren't forging to begin with.
error_transfer_alias: Bilinmeyen bir hata oluştu! Rumuz devredilebilir de  devredilmeyebilir de.
error_transfer_asset: An unknown error occured! Asset may or may not be transferred.

group_asset_help: Choose a group for this asset.
incorrectly_typed_passphrase: You have not typed the passphrase correctly, please try again!
info_merchant_message_required: The recipient account requires you to supply a specially formatted message.
info_referenced_transaction_hash: Due to you using a referenced transaction hash, 50 BURST is held in custody until the transaction is confirmed or expired.
issue_asset_warning: Warning: Once submitted, you will not be able to change this information again, ever. Make sure it is correct.
marketplace_tags_help: Choose up to 3 tags, separate them with comma's.
memorize_passphrase_help: Lütfen bu parolayı güvenli bir yerde saklayın. Burst hesabınıza erişmek için bu parola gereklidir.
memorize_passphrase_help_addon: Parolayı kaybederseniz herhangi bir işlem yapamazsınız, yani madeni paralarınız kaybolur. Parola kurtarılamaz. Bu parolayı gizli tut. Parolayı bilen herkes hesap sahibine aittir.
multiple_assets_differences: Multiple different assets have been sold and/or bought.
name: İsim
new_user_text: Sen yeni bir kullanıcı mısın? Yeni bir hesap oluşturun ve bir Burst üyesi olun.
news_section_disabled: Haber bölümü şu anda devre dışı.
no_account_q_create_account: Hesabınız yok mu? Bir tane oluşturmak için burayı tıklatın!
no_asset_search_results: Arama sorgusuyla eşleşen hiçbir varlık  bulunamadı.
no_asset_selected: Lütfen sol kenar çubuğuna bir ürün seçin.
no_assets_available: You don't have any assets in your bookmark list yet. Click on "Add Asset" in the top right corner to add one.
no_buy_orders_for_asset: No buy orders for this asset.
no_products_listed_yet: You haven't listed any products for sale yet, add one.
no_public_key_activate: Bu hesap henüz aktif değil. Hesabınızı etkinleştirmek ve güvence altına almak için tıklayın.
no_public_key_warning: Uyarı !: Hesabınızın ortak bir anahtarı yok! Bu, diğer hesaplar gibi korunmadığı anlamına gelir. Ortak anahtarınızı almak için lütfen hesabınızı etkinleştirin.
no_sell_orders_for_asset: No sell orders for this asset.
node_not_set: Düğüm değiştirilemedi. En muhtemel olan ulaşılamaz değil.
old_browser_warning: You are using an old Internet Explorer. Please update your IE or open localhost:8125 with your favorite Browser!
passphrase_disclosure_warning: Attention: Don't ever disclose your passphrase. If you lose it you lose access to your account!
passphrase_length_warning: Şifre en az 35 karakter uzunluğunda olmalıdır.
passphrase_required_to_decrypt_data: Your passphrase is required to decrypt this data.
passphrase_warning:
Attention: The passphrase is everything that stands between your account and the rest of the world. Do not use any meaningful sentence, especially any that appears in song or literature.

Don't ever disclose your passphrase. If you lose it you lose access to your account!
passphrase_write_below: Your passphrase is very important! In order to be sure that you have saved it, please write your passphrase below:
password_required_for_decryption: Bu iletinin şifresini çözmek için şifreniz gerekirlidir.
pin_hint: PIN, hesabınızla yapılan işlemleri doğrulamak için kullanılır. Ezberlemesi kolay, kısa bir alfasayısal değer olabilir. PIN kodunuzu unutursanız, önceden oluşturulmuş şifreyi kullanarak hesabınızı yeniden oluşturabilirsiniz.
public_key_actions: (Hesap bilgilerini ayarla, bir mesaj gönder, bir rumuz al, burst gönder...)
recent_transactions_since: O zamandan beri yapılan son işlemler
recipient_alias_suggestion: If you want to type an alias, prepend it with the @ character.
recipient_info: The recipient account has a public key and a balance of __burst__ BURST.
recipient_malformed: The recipient account is malformed, please adjust.
recipient_malformed_suggestion: Alıcı adresi hatalı biçimlendirilmiş, __alıcı mı__ demek istedin?
recipient_malformed_suggestion_plural: Alıcı adresi hatalı biçimlendirilmiş, aşağıdakilerden herhangi birini demek ister misin:
recipient_no_public_key: The recipient account does not have a public key, meaning it has never had an outgoing transaction. The account has a balance of __burst__ BURST. Please double check your recipient address before submitting.
recipient_no_public_key_pka: The recipient account does not have a public key, meaning it has never had an outgoing transaction. The account has a balance of __burst__ BURST. To submit this request you must supply the recipient public key also.
recipient_problem: There is a problem with the recipient account:
recipient_public_key_account: The public key corresponds to account __account_id__.
recipient_public_key_already_announced: This account's public key is already announced. Use the account ID instead.
recipient_unknown: The recipient account is an unknown account, meaning it has never had an incoming or outgoing transaction. Please double check your recipient address before submitting.
recipient_unknown_pka: The recipient account is an unknown account, meaning it has never had an incoming or outgoing transaction.
seed_password_generator: İmlecinizi rastgele sayı üretecini tohumlamak ve güvenli bir parola oluşturmak için hareket ettirin.
select_contact_in_sidebar: Please select a contact in the left sidebar.
select_node_description: Bağlanmak istediğiniz eşi seçin. Önerilen bir eş kullanabilirsiniz, ancak isteğe bağlı eş URL'sini de girebilirsiniz.
sell_order_description_help: Per whole asset sold you will receive __burst__ BURST, making a total of __total_burst__ BURST once everything has been sold.
start_forging_confirmation: Dövmeyi  onaylamak için aşağıdaki düğmeyi tıklatın.
status_blockchain_downloading: The blockchain is currently downloading. Please wait until it is up to date.
status_blockchain_rescanning: The blockchain is currently rescanning. Please wait until that has completed.
status_new_account: Welcome to your new BURST account. Your account ID is __account_id__
status_new_account_old: Welcome to your new BURST account. Your account ID is __account_id__. You should fund it with some coins.
stop_forging_confirmation: If you are sure you want to stop forging, click the button below to confirm.
stop_forging_confirmation_passphrase: If you are sure you want to stop forging, type your passphrase to confirm.
submit_forms_on_enter_help: Be careful when choosing to submit forms via the enter key, submitting can't be undone.

success_asset_exchange_change_group_name: Group name has been changed successfully.

success_dgs_feedback: The marketplace purchase feedback has been submitted.

success_dgs_price_change: The marketplace item's price has been changed successfully.

success_dgs_quantity_change: The marketplace item's quantity has been changed successfully.
success_dgs_refund: The marketplace purchase has been refunded.
success_hash_verification: The downloaded version has been verified, the hash is correct. You may proceed with the installation.
success_issue_asset: Kıymet oluşturuldu ve yakında hazır olacaktır.
success_passphrase_confirmed: Passphrase confirmed successfully, you are now logged in.
success_sell_alias: Your alias sale offer has been created successfully!

success_transfer_alias: Your alias has been transferred successfully!

success_valid_token: The token is valid and belongs to account __account_link__. It was generated on __timestamp__.
suggested_fee_help:
Ucuz ücret:% 50 şans işlemi sonraki on bloktan birinde yapılır.
Standart ücret:% 50 şans işlemi sonraki satırda yapılır.
Öncelik ücreti:% 90 şans işlemi yapılır sonraki blokta ve sonraki iki blokta% 99 yapmak için.
testnet_login_warning: Log in with your TestNet account - not your real one!
testnet_warning: Warning: You are connected to the TestNet. Do not use your real passphrase!
title: Title
unknown_recipients_text: The following recipient(s) could not be validated:
update_beta_available: A new experimental release is available. It is not recommended that you install this unless you know what you're doing.
update_blockchain_downloading: The blockchain is still downloading, check again after it's up to date.
update_multiple_available: Both a general and experimental release are available. It is not recommended that you install the experimental release unless you know what you're doing.
update_testnet: BRS cannot be updated whilst connected to the testnet.
update_up_to_date: You have the latest release already. There is no need to update.
waiting_on_seller: Satıcı malları teslim etmek için bekliyor.
wallet_update_available: A new version of the BURST Wallet application is available for download here. It must be downloaded and installed manually.
you_sold_assets: You sold or transferred 1 __name__ asset.
you_sold_assets_plural: You sold or transferred __count__ __name__ assets.
